name: XWUI Label Component
description: Form label component for labeling form inputs. Supports required indicator, disabled state, various sizes, and htmlFor attribute for accessibility.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

required.description: Whether the field is required (shows asterisk)

htmlFor.description: HTML for attribute to associate label with input

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the label

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component
